snippet: The defending champion Serena Williams and fifth-seeded Maria Sharapova were drawn into the same section for the Australian Open on Friday, meaning last year’s finalists could meet in the quarterfinals.
abstract: Serena Williams gets tough draw in Australian Open tennis tournament, event she won in 2015; other tennis news noted.
lead_paragraph: The defending champion Serena Williams and fifth-seeded Maria Sharapova were drawn into the same section for the Australian Open on Friday, meaning last year’s finalists could meet in the quarterfinals.
